definition: bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well

sentences.english: The song was of great importance and benefits to Zhuge Liang's aspiration and achievement in life.
sentences.chinese: 此事於諸葛亮一生之志節與事業，裨益實多。

sentences.english: The dimples of encouragement are good for me and you.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵的笑靨於你我大有裨益。

sentences.english: From a financial stand-point alone, safety pays off.
sentences.chinese: 單從經濟角度來看，安全生產也是大有裨益的。

sentences.english: Green production, so to speak, will be tremendously beneficial to a business' long-term development.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，綠色生產對一家公司的長遠發展裨益甚大。

sentences.english: This layer is the layer where static type safety will really help.
sentences.chinese: 所以，靜態類型安全在這一層中將會大有裨益。

sentences.english: Perhaps our intercultural journey can be of help to others.
sentences.chinese: 也許我們的跨文化之旅能夠對他人有所裨益。

sentences.english: The paper is useful to the preliminary designs and construction for the diversion tunnel on the right bank.
sentences.chinese: 本文對右岸導流隧洞的初步設計和施工設計有所裨益。

sentences.english: Another technique that works well with holistic learning is retracing.
sentences.chinese: 另一個對全面學習大有裨益的就是追溯或複習。

sentences.english: Such recommendations will weigh in his favour.
sentences.chinese: 這種推薦對望大有裨益。

sentences.english: Adequate drinking of Taibai Liquor is helpful for people′s health.
sentences.chinese: 白酒能治病強身，適量飲用太白酒，對健康有裨益。

sentences.english: Were an all-eating shame and thriftless praise.
sentences.chinese: 是貪婪的羞恥和毫無裨益的頌揚。

sentences.english: This is conducive to the right understanding of the discrete signal and syst…
sentences.chinese: 這對離散信號和離散系統的理解有所裨益。

sentences.english: And for Cao Yinghui, and Palmer nice cooperation will be of great advantage.
sentences.chinese: 而對曹穎惠來說，與艾康尼斯的合作也大有裨益。

sentences.english: Mock interviews and tape-recording answers will pay handsome dividends at the interview itself.
sentences.chinese: 做模擬面試並錄下回答會使你在真正面試時大獲裨益。

sentences.english: A crash course in color theory will go a long way.
sentences.chinese: 在色彩理論上個速成班對你大有裨益。

sentences.english: Adding chopped avocados to salads or sliced ones to sandwiches will go a long way.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉或三明治中加入些鱷梨會對你的身體大有裨益。

definition: bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well
harmful and without benefit (idiom); more harm than good
to promote/to enhance/to further/to advance (a cause etc)
